nodes.text:
The Electrorod was a type of melee weapon that used electricity over blunt edges.
The tip of an electrorod packed enough charge that it could knock an opponent unconscious with just a grazing blow.
In 3954 BBY a female mercenary owned a short Electrorod and used it in combat against the Sith Lord Scourge shortly before her death.
The electrorod first appeared within Drew Karpyshyn's novel The Old Republic: Revan, which was published on November 15, 2011.
